Hiring Opensource Blogs

Opensource

At Invana, we strongly believe that Innovation needs openness and Collaborations from different directions. So we always try to develop as much tech as possible in opensource!

- Ravi Raja Merugu - Head of Technology, Invana

Web Crawler Plus

A micro-framework built on scrapy to crawl the sites. It can use MongoDB, Elasticsearch and Solr databases to cache the requests and also extract the data using parser configs and save them.

Apache Beam io Ptransforms

The missing I/O PTransforms of Apache Beam in python; which already exist in Java SDK based but not yet supported in the official apache-beam module.
